titles.title: HP326 There's a spirit in the air,

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a spirit in the air,
telling Christians everywhere:
"Praise the love that Christ revealed,
living, working in our world"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lose your shyness, find your tongue,
tell the world what God has done:
God in Christ has come to stay.
Live tomorrow's life today.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When believers break the bread,
when a hungry child is fed,
praise the love that Christ revealed
living, working in our world.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Still the Spirit gives us light,
seeing wrong and setting right:
God in Christ has come to stay.
Live tomorrow's life today.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
When a stranger not alone,
where the homeless find a home,
praise the love that Christ revealed,
living, working in our world.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
May the Spirit fill our praise,
guide our thoughts and change our ways:
God in Christ has come to stay.
Live tomorrow's life today.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
There's a Spirit in the air,
calling people everywhere:
"Praise the love that Christ revealed,
living, working in our world"
